hero.title: Find reliable people in your area!
hero.subtitle: Build a support network around you in this new social application.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.step1Description: Create your profile and share your resources.
howItWorks.step2Description: Find fifes operating in your area.

trust.title: Find reliable people in your area!
trust.description: FiFe App builds a chain of trust. If your friends trust someone, you can trust them too. This is how the community you can count on is built.

about.title: Let's ask each other for help!
about.description: The goal of FiFe App is to create the safety and closeness of small communities even in big cities. We breathe the same air, let's stick together! Let it be normal again that we can count on each other!

newsletter.title: Don't miss out, subscribe to the newsletter!

aboutMe.title: Behind FiFe App
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Kristóf Ákos, a few years ago I had an idea to create a truly useful and safe social platform. A lot of time has passed since then, but my enthusiasm hasn't faded! I work for the Hungarian community and a better future. If these are important to you too, please support FiFe App!

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.contactsWarning: Attention! The data provided below is visible to all users.
edit.usernameHelp: If you provide a username, your profile will have a unique URL.

edit.title: Edit Biznisz
edit.uploading: Please wait while your biznisz is uploading
edit.intro: On this page you can add a new biznisz to your profile.
edit.description: Your bizniszek are your hobbies, skills or resources that you would like to share with your surroundings.
edit.example: If, for example, you make cookies on an assembly line and add this to your bizniszek, others will be able to find you using the cookie keyword.
edit.preview: This is how your biznisz will appear:
edit.descriptionPlaceholder: Longer description of what your biznisz is about.
edit.locationHelp: If the geographic location of your biznisz is important, you can specify it here with any accuracy.

recommendBizinessRemove.title: Don't recommend it anymore?
recommendBizinessRemove.text: You can withdraw your recommendation if you change your mind.

recommendBizinessAdd.title: Are you sure you recommend it?
recommendBizinessAdd.text: Only mark the biznisz as recommended if you know it's real and useful.

recommendProfileRemove.title: Don't trust them anymore?
recommendProfileRemove.text: You can withdraw your support if you change your mind.

recommendProfileAdd.title: Are you sure you trust them?
recommendProfileAdd.text: Only mark them as trustworthy if you think they won't scam others.

recommendationsModal.emptyMessage: Here will appear the people who marked you as trustworthy

myBuzinesses.empty: Your own bizniszek will appear here.
myBuzinesses.description:
Your bizniszek are a list of your hobbies, skills or professions that you want to share with others. 
If, for example, you make cookies on an assembly line and add this to your bizniszek, others will be able to find you using the cookie keyword.

csatlakozom.intro: FiFe starts in Budapest – your neighbors can be your best helpers. No need for distant customer service and multinational companies. It's enough if we are here for each other.
csatlakozom.mapView: That's why you can see on the map who, where, and how can help you.
csatlakozom.subtitle: Help may be across the street
csatlakozom.chooseMethod: Choose how you want to join:
csatlakozom.trustDescription:
On this social site, you will likely meet strangers. Since many people have reasons not to trust others, on this platform we make sure there is a basis for trust. 

If you meet someone here you trust and know they wouldn't deceive others, you can mark them as trustworthy on their profile, thus supporting and building our community through trust.
csatlakozom.guideline1: I will not be malicious to anyone!
csatlakozom.guideline2: I will consider my own and others' interests!
csatlakozom.guideline3: If someone behaves offensively towards me or others, I will report it!
csatlakozom.guidelinePrompt: If you will follow these, type the following text:
csatlakozom.joinCommunity: If you want to join this community, you must follow our guidelines:
csatlakozom.createAccountPrompt: You just need to create your account:
csatlakozom.nameHelper: Your name will be visible to everyone who is a member.
csatlakozom.passwordRequirement: Must contain lowercase, uppercase letters and a number.
csatlakozom.emailSent: We sent an email to this address:
csatlakozom.emailResent: Email sent! Check your spam folder too!
csatlakozom.waitBeforeResend: Please wait a bit before requesting another email.
csatlakozom.errorOccurred: Oops. Something went wrong, please try again!
